languages.text: "Я помню... как оступилась. Как сомнения в истинности Завета Паутины сбили меня с ног. Как я решила убить... не потому, что слышала шепот Его. Но потому, что посчитала это правильным. Смерть шептала мое имя. Ибо ткач без стези подобен небу без звезд — он тонет во мраке собственной души".

traits.locale_text: "Я помню... как оступилась. Как сомнения в истинности стези Анн'шини и праведности Кровавой паутины сбили меня с ног. Как я впервые решила убить... не потому, что слышала шепот Его. Но потому, что посчитала это правильным. Смерть шептала мое имя. Звала меня. Ибо ткач без стези подобен небу без звезд — он тонет во мраке собственной души".

languages.text: "I remember... stumbling. I remember my doubt in the truth of the Tenets throwing me off my feet. I remember deciding to kill... and not because I had heard His whisper, but because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a spinner without a thread is like a sky without stars. They would drown in their own soul's darkness."
languages.original_text: "Я помню... как оступилась. Как сомнения в истинности Завета Паутины сбили меня с ног. Как я решила убить... не потому, что слышала шепот Его. Но потому, что посчитала это правильным. Смерть шептала мое имя. Ибо ткач без стези подобен небу без звезд — он тонет во мраке собственной души".

traits.locale_text: "I remember... misstepping. Being thrown off my feet by doubt about the truth of Ahn'shini. Deciding to kill... not because I had heard His whisper. But because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a Weaver without a way is like a sky without stars. They will drown in their own soul's darkness."

"I remember... misstepping. Being thrown off my feet by doubt about the truth of Ahn'shini. Deciding to kill... not because I had heard His whisper. But because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a Weaver without a way is like a sky without stars. They will drown in their own soul's darkness."

They would drown in their own soul's darkness."

They would drown in their own soul's darkness."

languages.text: « Je me souviens... avoir trébuché. Je me souviens avoir perdu pied après avoir douté de la véracité des Préceptes. Je me souviens d'avoir décidé de tuer, non pas parce qu'Il me l'avait murmuré, mais parce que je l'estimais juste. La mort a murmuré mon nom. Car comme un ciel sans étoiles, une tisseuse sans fil est vouée à se noyer dans les ténèbres de son âme. »
languages.original_text: "I remember... stumbling. I remember my doubt in the truth of the Tenets throwing me off my feet. I remember deciding to kill... and not because I had heard His whisper, but because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a spinner without a thread is like a sky without stars. They would drown in their own soul's darkness."

traits.locale_text: « Je me souviens... avoir trébuché. Je me souviens avoir perdu pied après avoir douté de la véracité des Préceptes. Je me souviens d'avoir décidé de tuer, non pas parce qu'Il me l'avait murmuré, mais parce que je l'estimais juste. La mort a murmuré mon nom. Car comme un ciel sans étoiles, une tisseuse sans fil est vouée à se noyer dans les ténèbres de son âme. »

languages.text: «Recuerdo haber... tropezado. Recuerdo que mis dudas respecto a la veracidad de los preceptos me hicieron caer. Recuerdo haber decidido matar... no porque Él me lo susurrara, sino porque lo había considerado correcto. La Muerte susurró mi nombre. Pues un tejedor sin hilo es como un cielo sin estrellas. Se ahogaría en la oscuridad de su propia alma».
languages.original_text: "I remember... stumbling. I remember my doubt in the truth of the Tenets throwing me off my feet. I remember deciding to kill... and not because I had heard His whisper, but because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a spinner without a thread is like a sky without stars. They would drown in their own soul's darkness."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerdo haber... tropezado. Recuerdo que mis dudas respecto a la veracidad de los preceptos me hicieron caer. Recuerdo haber decidido matar... no porque Él me lo susurrara, sino porque lo había considerado correcto. La Muerte susurró mi nombre. Pues un tejedor sin hilo es como un cielo sin estrellas. Se ahogaría en la oscuridad de su propia alma».

languages.text: 「私は…つまずいてしまった。信条を疑って、気持ちが乱れてしまったの。確かに殺すと決めたけれど、それはあのお方の囁きを聞いたからではなくて、それが正しいと私が判断したから。死神が私の名を囁いたわ。糸のない紡ぎ手は、星のない空のようなもの。 己の魂の闇の中で溺れてしまうのよ」
languages.original_text: "I remember... stumbling. I remember my doubt in the truth of the Tenets throwing me off my feet. I remember deciding to kill... and not because I had heard His whisper, but because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a spinner without a thread is like a sky without stars. They would drown in their own soul's darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…つまずいてしまった。信条を疑って、気持ちが乱れてしまったの。確かに殺すと決めたけれど、それはあのお方の囁きを聞いたからではなくて、それが正しいと私が判断したから。死神が私の名を囁いたわ。糸のない紡ぎ手は、星のない空のようなもの。 己の魂の闇の中で溺れてしまうのよ」

languages.text: “我记得……我是怎么迷失的。我记得我对信条产生了怀疑，这让我迷失了方向。我记得我打算杀人……并不是因为我听到了祂的低语，而是因为我觉得那个人该杀。死亡低声呼唤着我的名字，因为失去了丝线的织网者就仿佛失去了群星的天空，终究会迷失在自己灵魂的黑暗之中。”
languages.original_text: "I remember... stumbling. I remember my doubt in the truth of the Tenets throwing me off my feet. I remember deciding to kill... and not because I had heard His whisper, but because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a spinner without a thread is like a sky without stars. They would drown in their own soul's darkness."

traits.locale_text: “我记得……我是怎么迷失的。我记得我对信条产生了怀疑，这让我迷失了方向。我记得我打算杀人……并不是因为我听到了祂的低语，而是因为我觉得那个人该杀。死亡低声呼唤着我的名字，因为失去了丝线的织网者就仿佛失去了群星的天空，终究会迷失在自己灵魂的黑暗之中。”

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich ... dass ich stolperte. Mein Zweifel an der Wahrheit der Grundsätze zog mir den Boden unter den Füßen weg. Ich beschloss, zu töten ... aber nicht, weil ich Sein Flüstern hörte, sondern weil ich es für richtig hielt. Der Tod flüsterte meinen Namen. Denn eine Spinnerin ohne Faden ist wie ein Himmel ohne Sterne. Sie ertrinkt in der Dunkelheit ihrer eigenen Seele."
languages.original_text: "I remember... stumbling. I remember my doubt in the truth of the Tenets throwing me off my feet. I remember deciding to kill... and not because I had heard His whisper, but because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a spinner without a thread is like a sky without stars. They would drown in their own soul's darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich ... dass ich stolperte. Mein Zweifel an der Wahrheit der Grundsätze zog mir den Boden unter den Füßen weg. Ich beschloss, zu töten ... aber nicht, weil ich Sein Flüstern hörte, sondern weil ich es für richtig hielt. Der Tod flüsterte meinen Namen. Denn eine Spinnerin ohne Faden ist wie ein Himmel ohne Sterne. Sie ertrinkt in der Dunkelheit ihrer eigenen Seele."

languages.text: "Tökezlediğimi... Hatırlıyorum. İlkelerin hakikatine dair kuşkularımın ayaklarımı yerden kestiğini hatırlıyorum. Öldürmeye karar verişimi hatırlıyorum. Ancak O'nun fısıltısını duyduğum için değil, bunun doğru olduğu düşündüğüm için karar verdim. Ölüm, ismimi fısıldadı. İpliği olmayan bir dokur için bu, tek bir yıldız bile görünmeyen gökyüzü gibidir. Böyle dokurlar, kendi ruhlarının karanlığında boğulurlar."
languages.original_text: "I remember... stumbling. I remember my doubt in the truth of the Tenets throwing me off my feet. I remember deciding to kill... and not because I had heard His whisper, but because I deemed it to be right. Death whispered my name. For a spinner without a thread is like a sky without stars. They would drown in their own soul's darkness."
